title: Deepcool Does It Right WITHOUT RGB!
description: Deepcool and Gamer Storm came to CES 2019 with pc cases without a ton of RGB. The Macube 550 gaming case and Assassin III CPU cooler are two of the best designs we say and they were accomplished WITHOUT RGB.     A big thanks to all our sponsors for CES  MSI Thermaltake Razer Corsair MSI  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #deepcool #gamerstorm #ces2019 #hardwarecanucks
